NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Crops: Allow farmers to walk through all crops.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Scare: Allow farmers to walk through scarecrows.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Sprin: Allow farmers to walk through sprinklers.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Forag: Allow farmers to walk through forage items.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Tea: Allow farmers to walk through tea bushes.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_TreeG: Allow farmers to walk through tree saplings, up to the given growth stage.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Fruit: Allow farmers to walk through fruit tree saplings, up to the given growth stage.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Weeds: Allow farmers to walk through weeds.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_AllPa: Makes selected obstacles passable to all entities, not just farmers. This notably effects monsters walking through weeds.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_SlowD: Farmers will walk slightly slower through objects, just like in tall grass.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Shake: Makes non-crop objects shake when passing by (crops automatically shake).
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Rustl: Passing through objects also makes the rustling sound.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Custo: Some objects require custom drawing logic in order to shake and calculate the correct layer depth. This logic may be incompatible with other mods. This option disables the custom drawing and may prevent errors that could arise. It is not recommended to disable custom drawing if no issues are present.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Inclu: Specify individual objects that are passable, using either base name or qualified item ID, such as Twig or (O)294. Comma-separated.
NCarigon.PassableCrops/config_desc_Exclu: Specify individual objects that are NOT passable, using either base name or qualified item ID, such as Twig or (O)294. Comma-separated.
